snippet: The major market indexes rose quickly in the opening minutes of trading, but that faded after top Republicans supported a United States-led attack against Syria.
abstract: Stock market rises modestly as renewed fears about American military attack on Syria dampens early rally.
lead_paragraph: The major market indexes rose quickly in the opening minutes of trading, but that faded after top Republicans supported a United States-led attack against Syria.

headline.main: Congressional Talks on Syria Thwart Early Market Surge
headline.print_headline: Congressional Talks on Syria Thwart Early Market Surge
